attributes.action: Bring Back Bubbles Beach Club, Liverpool
attributes.additional_details: Liverpool City Council should re-consider allowing Bubbles Beach Club to remain which improves the waterfront experience
attributes.background:
Bubbles Beach Club was the first beach club in history to be installed at Liverpool's prestigious waterfront in June 2016. 

Liverpool City Council agreed to let the beach club remain until October however changed their mind on the last working day. People are outraged the Beach Club has closed

rejection.details:
We are only able to accept petitions addressed to central government or Parliament.

This petition relates to a matter which is the responsibility of Liverpool City Council:
https://liverpool.gov.uk/
